products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Smoke Grey Solar/Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their smoke grey colour - a dark warm grey tone that is a perfect sophisticated and sleek complement to any room.
